subject: Football
Concussions
Sports Medicine
lead_paragraph: Frank Gore ran for 104 yards and a touchdown, Jay Cutler threw a career-high five interceptions and San Francisco snapped a four-game losing streak by beating the Chicago Bears.
snippet: Frank Gore ran for 104 yards and a touchdown, Jay Cutler threw a career-high five interceptions and San Francisco snapped a four-game losing streak by beating the Chicago Bears.
